Platsr API Documentation

Introduction

The Platsr API gives you as a developer access to tons of local history data all witch is available under open licenses. Platsr.se and its services is provided by the Swedish National Heritage Board, this documentation and tool is developed and maintained by volunteers and should not be #TODO with the Swedish National Heritage Board.

The Platsr API implements a GET REST-like interface with JSON responses except for the Archive Object methods in witch the API returns RDF responses.

The following documentation provides documentation for all methods available. It do not and do not aim to cover the JSON response format, for exploring it an API sandbox is provided.
